document_data.name: ''Amulet of the Harpers''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Amulets of the Harpers''''' were [[enchanted]] [[amulet|necklace]]s imbued with protective magics.
document_data.Description: ''Amulets of the Harpers'' were delicate pieces of jewelry inlaid with several [[gem]]stones.
document_data.Powers: The necklace gave the wearer the ability to cast the ''[[Shield (spell)|shield]]'' [[spell]] once per day. Additionally, it imparted wisdom onto the wearer, which protected their mind.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, an ''amulet of the Harpers'' belonged to [[Talli]], a [[Harper]] quartermaster who followed the [[druid]] Harper hero [[Jaheira]] into the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]].
